abstract: As Yahoo reports earnings on Tuesday, investors still want to know whether a deal with Microsoft is near, as some Yahoo executive privately suggest.
snippet: As Yahoo reports earnings on Tuesday, investors still want to know whether a deal with Microsoft is near, as some Yahoo executive privately suggest.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo reports first-quarter financial results on Tuesday after the market close, and analysts expect revenue and profit will be down from a year ago. The results suggest that the company’s troubles are far from over.

headline.main: Yahoo Investors Still Thinking About Microsoft
